raw_mentions:
Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:


Reagent: PepMix pp65 HCMVA, from JPT Peptide Technologies GmbH, 10115 Berlin; pp65 (HCMVA) # P06725, 1 vial = 25 μg per peptide; mix of 138 peptides (15mers, overlap 11); storage stock of 400 μg/ml in analytical grade DMSO (kept at -20<sup>0</sup>C); prepare a working stock of 2 μg/ml.
Reagent: non-relevant nonamer control peptide. For example, for BALB/c mice a Kd binding malaria peptide (SYVPSAEQI); storage stock of lmg/ml in DMSO (kept at -20°C); prepare a working stock of 2 μg/ml.
Prepare Brefeldin A stock (Sigma # B-7651) of 10 mg/ml in DMSO; prepare working solution of 20 μg/ml in Click's RPMI/full medium (5 μg/ml final concentration in re- stimulation well).
PMA (Phorbol 12-myristate 13-acetate), Sigma # P8139; prepare stock of lmg/ml in DMSO; prepare working solution of 0.4 μg/ml in Click's RPMI/full medium (0.05 μg PMA/ml in re- stimulation well). 
Ionomycin, Sigma # 10634; prepare stock of lmg/ml in DMSO; prepare working solution of 4 μg/ml in Click's RPMI/full medium (0.5 μg PMA/ml in re-stimulation well).
